concept.title: Topic-Based Authoring
concept.shortdesc: Topic-based authoring is an approach to writing in which authors create individual chunks of writing called topics.

conbody.p: Topic-based authoring is often contrasted with document-based authoring. While document-based authoring is linear, topic-based authoring allows authors to create many individual chunks of writing called topics. Those topics can then be assembled and output in a variety of formats.
